title: Game full system crash 15-22 minutes, no bug splat
body:
I  have this issue, 970m gtx, i7, 16gbddr3, windows 10 anniversary edition. Computer freezes about 18 minutes into every other game, it puts the computer into a screenshot-like state, simalalrly described from other players. I cannot navigate to task manager, because the league application is forced to front, I even dual monitored and could not actively click on the task manager in the other screen during the crash.
Stuff I have tried -
Update Nvidia drivers.
Uninstall fully, reinstall from scratch.
Hextech repair function.
Bought a better cooling pad to keep my temps at 60c, a very safe temp for my 970m (battlefield one at 1080 60fps gets far hotter than that, and I can play it for hours on end.)
Lowered all graphics settings
Ran in compatibility mode for Windows 8
Ran as admin
I also in another ticket that riot closed provided my HW monitor data to riot for a full 40 minute game that I somehow made it through (after all it is every 2 games orso, while sometimes every game)

This has not only lost me ranked games but has been an actually damaging to my PC partially because I have to HARD SHUT DOWN my pc. This is insane that there is no fix. Please, please get in contact with us.

replies.body: Thanks for the advice, I will make a macro. But that does not fix the initial freezing. I get 120 fps 61ms ping

Have you tried turning it on and off?
but seriously, this usually isn't a hardware problem, I tried running league on a mac, hell it can get 60 fps at medium.
if you can still use your computer(the mouse can move) in one of these situations, try using a razor macro to auto close all apps opened.

just a thought, it probably wont work.
